mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.INSTRUCTION, U.ID AS AUTHOR_ID, U.NAME AS AUTHOR_NAME, A.FILE_ATTACH_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REPLY_YN, A.COMMENT_YN FROM BOARD_MASTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS U ON A.AUTHOR_ID = U.ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_MASTER ( ID, NAME, INSTRUCTION, FILE_ATTACH_YN, FILE_COUNT, FILE_MAX_SIZE, FILE_MAX_SIZE, REPLY_YN, USE_YN, COMMENT_YN, AUTHOR_ID, MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{instruction}, #{fileAttachYn}, #{fileCount}, #{fileMaxSize}, #{replyYn}, #{useYn}, #{commentYn}, #{authorId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_MASTER SET NAME = #{name}, INSTRUCTION = #{instruction}, FILE_ATTACH_YN = #{fileAttachYn}, FILE_COUNT = #{fileCount}, FILE_MAX_SIZE = #{fileMaxSize}, REPLY_YN = #{replyYn}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, COMMENT_YN = #{commentYn}, AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId}, MODIFIED_TIME = now() WHERE ID = #{id}
